INSERT INTO problem ( id, title, url, tier, accepted_user_count, recommended_count ) VALUES ( #{problem.id}, #{problem.title}, #{problem.url}, #{problem.tier}, #{problem.acceptedUserCount}, #{problem.recommendedCount} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = #{problem.title}, url = #{problem.url}, tier = #{problem.tier}, accepted_user_count = #{problem.acceptedUserCount}, recommended_count = #{problem.recommendedCount}

INSERT INTO tag ( id, tag_key, title ) VALUES ( #{tag.id}, #{tag.key}, #{tag.title} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tag_key = #{tag.key}, title = #{tag.title.value}
SELECT t.created_at, t.updated_at FROM tag t where t.id = #{tag.id};

INSERT INTO problem_tag (pk, problem_id, tag_id) VALUES (CONCAT(#{problemId.value}, '-', #{tagId.value}), #{problemId.value}, #{tagId.value}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE problem_id = #{problemId.value}, tag_id = #{tagId.value}
